name: Dino Mayhem (TheDigitalDauber)
description:
Destroy people/vehicles to earn points. Eat people to regain health. Eating goats regain more health. See how long you can survive and how many points you can get.

Pause - Esc

Move - Left and Right Arrows or A and D

Jump - Up Arrow or W

Bite Attack - Space

Tail Attack - Double tap Space

Eat - Hold Space until eyes light up, then release
